title: Chapter 1584 - How Brazen
body:
Chapter 1584 - How Brazen

Mirror Lake got its name from its perpetually smooth, waveless surface.

The lake was as boundlessly vast as an ocean, and it was located on the border of the Dark and White Reed Provinces.

The shore of the Mirror Lake was a sea of people. Spectator stands had been placed along the shoreline, and they were full of prominent experts from all across the Immortal Realm.

The spectators included no small number of prominent Immortal Lords!

And out in the distance, over the Mirror Lake, there stood a ten-thousand-foot arena.

Night was fast approaching, and the light of dusk burned like fire. It cast its orange glow on the smooth surface of the Mirror Lake, making it glow like a surging flame.

With an Immortal Lord like Fu Yunzhong leading the way, Su Yi and Fang Han smoothly bypassed the various layers of security to arrive at the shoreline.

“It’s a pity, but we arrived late. The Mirror Lake Immortal Assembly is almost over,” said Fu Yunzhong. He indeed found this an awful shame.

A moment later, he laughed. “Fortunately, we aren’t too late. The next match is the finals! The fight everyone’s most looking forward...
